name: nw_connection_state_t
desc: States indicating whether a connection can be used to send and receive data.

items.name: var nw_connection_state_waiting: nw_connection_state_t
items.desc: The connection is waiting for a network path change.

items.name: var nw_connection_state_preparing: nw_connection_state_t
items.desc: The connection in the process of being established.

items.name: var nw_connection_state_ready: nw_connection_state_t
items.desc: The connection is established, and ready to send and receive data.

items.name: var nw_connection_state_failed: nw_connection_state_t
items.desc: The connection has disconnected or encountered an error.
